name: Tribes: Ascend Soundboard
body:
![Decorator](http://i.imgur.com/FRf9NTD.png) *** ### Features * Three original Tribes: Ascend voice packs including Light, Medium & Heavy * No permissions required * No ads * Holo (#YOLOHOLO) * Free ### Changelog
Version: 1.0
Release Date: 01.01.2013
-> Initial Release
### Contact Found a bug? A feature request? Feel free to contact me at anytime. > [@peterloorke](http://www.twitter.com/peterloorke), > @egemenyildiz, > [steam](http://steamcommunity.com/id/peterloorke/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
